suppress.notes: CVE-2018-1258: we do not use Spring Method Security, so this does not affect us. see https://pivotal.io/security/cve-2018-1258. we are on latest Spring Framework version : 5.2.2.RELEASE : https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-framework/wiki/Spring-Framework-Versions
We are on latest version , these are coming form mvn:pkg
